definitions.definition: Someone skilled in the writing of shorthand or the use of a stenotype machine , especially for the purpose of rapid transcription of speech. One employed in such a role: a professional transcriptionist who employs shorthand.
One who invents or studies systems of shorthand .

main_definition: Someone skilled in the writing of shorthand or the use of a stenotype machine , especially for the purpose of rapid transcription of speech. One employed in such a role: a professional transcriptionist who employs shorthand.
secondary_definitions: One who invents or studies systems of shorthand .
